name: python-uv-speckit
postCreateCommand: set -e; curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh; export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"; uv --version; uv tool install specify-cli --from git+https://github.com/github/spec-kit.git; specify --help || true; if [ -f pyproject.toml ]; then uv sync --dev || uv sync; fi
